title: horrible acting and filmed with either an old cell phone or a potato.
review: I was tricked into watching this because the good reviews on imdb. I'm not even sure why I didn't just turn it off..I guess I figured nothing could be this bad. I doubt there was a budget at all, just some people thrown together and filmed with a phone. My question is how did this get a 7.5 rating. There are very good movies that have good actors that only get a 5-6 rating.

title: DIE!
review:
The film opens with a group of clowns who live at a motel near a gold mine. Some rednecks set the place on fire and the goldmine doesn't enter the story again. Years later, a group of young adults stays there, get stranded, and become fodder for killer klowns from inner space.

The premise isn't bad, but the acting and dialogue were a joke. They created characters and didn't know what to do with them. Joseph Kelly cannot write or direct.

Guide: F-word. Sex. Ugly butt crack nudity

title: zero entertainment value
review: The worse movie experience of my life. absolutely nothing positive to say about it. feels like it was made on one of those old super 8 movie projectors.
